Class LocationController

  • java.lang.Object

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/secure/locations")
public class LocationController
extends BaseController

      • getLocations

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationListApiResponse getLocations(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                        io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser)
        GET /api/secure/locations/
        Gets all Locations in the database.

        RESPONSE: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "locations": [Location]
   }
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be SUPER

      • getLocationByLocationId

        @RequestMapping(value="/byLocationId/{locationId}",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationApiResponse getLocationByLocationId(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                        io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                        java.util.UUID locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                                        boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/locations/byLocationId/{locationId}?filled="{true|false}
        Gets a location by the supplied "locationId". You can specify that you want the Location filled with its children Devices and Assets by setting the request parameter "filled" to "true".

        RESPONSE: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Location
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The calling user must either:
        • Be SUPER
        • Be ADMIN of the Company possessing the Location with "locationId"
        • Be USER that has been granted access to the Location with "locationId"

      • getLocationsForAuthenticatedUserFilled

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationListApiResponse getLocationsForAuthenticatedUserFilled(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                                  io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/locations/forAuthenticated?filled={true|false}
        Gets all the Locations for the authenticated user's company, or the Locations the User has been granted access to, if they are a USER. If you want each Location's children populated in the response, specify "?filled=true" at the end of the URL.

        RESPONSE: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "locations": [Location]
   }
 }

      • getLocationsByCompanyId

        @RequestMapping(value="/byCompanyId/{companyId}",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationListApiResponse getLocationsByCompanyId(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                          io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                          java.util.UUID companyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                                          boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/locations/byCompanyId/{companyId}
        Gets all the locations in the Company identified by "companyId".

        RESPONSE: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response" {
     "locations": [Location]
   }
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be SUPER.

      • putLocationForAuthenticatedAdmin

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=POST)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationApiResponse putLocationForAuthenticatedAdmin(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                         io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                         io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiLocation location)
        POST /api/secure/locations/forAuthenticated
        Adds a new location to the database for the authenticated user.

        REQUEST BODY (CREATE): 
            {
   (required) "name": String,
   (required) "city": String,
   (required) "state" String(2),  // e.g. "AR", "CA", ...
 }


        REQUEST BODY (UPDATE): 
            {
   (required) "id": UUID,
   (optional) "name": String
   (optional) "city": String,
   (optional) "state": String(2),
 }


        RESPONSE: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Location
 }


        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be an ADMIN at their company or a SUPER.

      • deleteLocationById

        @RequestMapping(value="/{locationId}",
                method=DELETE)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.location.LocationApiResponse deleteLocationById(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                         io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                         java.util.UUID locationId)
        DELETE /api/secure/locations/{locationId}
        Deletes a Location by id. The Location must be completely empty before total deletion.

        REQUEST BODY: 
            {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Location
 }

        PERMISSIONS:
        The user must be an ADMIN for the company where they're trying to delete this location.
